description: A large, fortified settlement of Anatolia mentioned by Herodotus.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Kerkenes Dağ

history.comment: Cited Summers ed. 2021, mentioned that the (presumed) ancient name comes from Herodotus; update references; update wikidata Pteria (Q7256680)
